categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: An individual was the second Padawan of Jedi Master Roan Shryne during the Clone Wars. In 19.5 BBY, the Padawan was killed in the Battle of Manari. The loss of his second student, combined with the demise of his first Padawan and his own master earlier during the war, left Shryne disillusioned about the war and the Jedi Master lost his hope in the Jedi Council.
The Padawan was briefly mentioned in the 2005 novel Dark Lord: The Rise of Darth Vader written by James Luceno.
